title: The Ghost’s Server: Kidnapping a Ghost Emperor as Husband - Novel Updates
genre: Horror   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Abandoned Children   Absent Parents   Alternate World   Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Crafting   Curses   Death   Female Protagonist   Feng Shui   Secrets   Thriller
author: 冉小狐
description: I was an abandoned child and had been plagued by strange illness since I was born. In order to cure my disease, I had to sleep in the black coffin and never went out. When I could finally go out, strange things happened one after another.>
